actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to authorize the appropriation of funds for the rehabilitation and resettlement of Bikini Atoll, Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands, and for other purposes.
subjects: Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands

summary.text: Authorizes $15,000,000 to be appropriated for rehabilitation and resettlement of Bikini Atoll.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the appropriation of funds for the rehabilitation and resettlement of Bikini Atoll, Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands, and for other purposes.
